DataElement.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Neutrophil Count 500 Recovery Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._.Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._.Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Neutrophil Count 500 Recovery
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter.:gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2866414
ReferenceDocuments.description: "PerformedObservation.dateRange [1] WHERE PerformedObservation.dateRange [1] IS THE OCCURANCE IMMEDIATELY BEFORE PerformedObservation.dateRange [2] AND PerformedObservation.dateRange [2] IS THE  OCCURANCE IMMEDIATELY BEFORE PerformedObservation.dateRange [3] AND (PerformedObservation.dateRange [n] IS LESS THAN PerformedObservation.dateRange [1] OR PerformedObservation.dateRange [n] IS GREATER THAN PerformedObservation.dateRange [3]) AND PerformedObservation [1,2,3,n] > DefinedObservation.nameCode = ""Determine absolute neutrophil count (ANC)"" AND DefinedObservation [ANC] > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure [Post-HCT Monitoring] AND PerformedObservation [1,2,3] > PerformedClinicalResult.value [1,2,3] IS GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO ""0.5 x 10E9/L"" AND PerformedClinicalResult.value [n] IS LESS THAN ""0.5 x 10E9/L"" AND PerformedObservation.dateRange [1,2,3,n]  IS GREATER THAN {transplant date}  {transplant date} is determined by: Subject > PerformedSubstanceAdministration.dateRange WHERE PerformedSubstanceAdministration.dateRange IS MAXIMUM AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstranceAdministration.nameCode = ""Administer hematopoietic stem cell product {transplantation}"""
